member.name: EMRTEXT
member.summary: The EMRTEXT structure contains members for text output.

member.name: EMRTEXT.ptlReference
member.summary: The logical coordinates of the reference point used to position the string.

member.name: EMRTEXT.nChars
member.summary: The number of characters in the string.

member.name: EMRTEXT.fOptions
member.summary: A value that indicates how to use the application-defined rectangle. This member can be a combination of the ETO_CLIPPED and ETO_OPAQUE values.

member.name: EMRTEXT.rcl
member.summary: An optional clipping and/or opaquing rectangle, in logical units.

member.name: EMRTEXT.offDx
member.summary: The offset to the intercharacter spacing array.
